column1: Forquilhinha is a municipality in the Brazilian state of Santa Catarina. In 2004
column3: 549 inhabitants. It covers an area of 184.557 km² at an altitude of 42 meters above sea level. It is the native town of cardinal Paulo Evaristo Arns and his sister Zilda Arns.

column1: The city is served by Diomício Freitas Airport.
This article is a translation of the corresponding article in the Portuguese-language Wikipedia.
